item.title: Docker/Kubernetes outside your room
item.description: Docker/K8s outside your room Context You want to quickly test a docker image from an editor, say Artifactory. Since you don’t want to install all the pre-requisites for an Artifactory server to run, you “docker pull” the image, and “docker run” its container (easy).
